prompt: Can you recommend tools for live translation on video calls?

hidden_queries: tools for live translation on video calls real time translation video conferencing
real time translation tools for Zoom Teams Meet interpretation features
metadata.generated_search_query: tools for live translation on video calls real time translation video conferencing

sources.title: Enabling and configuring translated captions - Zoom
sources.snippet: Zoom translated captions enable users to have the speech in a meeting or webinar automatically translated in real-time to captions in another language. For example, if a meeting participant is speaking in English, other participants can view captions in German, Italian, Japanese, and more.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are reliable tools and features you can use for live translation during video calls — real-time speech or caption translation, often across multiple platforms: Built-in platform features Zoom Language Interpretation & Live Captions – Assign interpreters to channels or enable automatic translated captions during meetings/webinars. Zoom+1
Microsoft Teams Live Captions & Translation – AI-powered live captions and in-meeting translations natively in Teams. Microsoft Support+1
Google Meet (with extensions) – Built-in captions plus browser extensions can bring real-time translation though not native audio translation. Tactiq
Dedicated third-party real-time translation tools Talo – AI interpreter that integrates with Zoom, Teams, Google Meet for real-time voice translation in ~60 languages. Talo

sources.title: Video Call Translation - Live translate with Vidby
sources.snippet: Vidby offers real-time automatic translation for video calls, streams, and events in over 150 languages, breaking language barriers. Try it for free!

citation_mappings.claim_text: Vidby – Real-time automatic translation for video calls and streaming in 150+ languages. Vidby
TransGull – Simultaneous interpretation with live bilingual subtitles for Zoom/Teams/Meet. TransGull

sources.title: 7 Best Tools for Multilingual Real-Time Translation in Video Calls
sources.snippet: Breaking language barriers in video calls has become easier than ever, thanks to modern translation technology. Whether you're running international meetings or connecting with friends abroad, there's now a rich selection of tools that can translate conversations in real time.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Wordly & Kudo – Tools focused on live translation and captions for large meetings/events (often enterprise). Fora Soft+1

sources.title: Live Translation Options for MS Teams in 2025: Interpretation and AI ...
sources.snippet: What happens when not everyone speaks the same language in your Microsoft Teams meeting? That’s where interpretation and live translation solutions like remote simultaneous interpretation, AI-powered speech translation, live AI captions and subtitles come in. Microsoft Teams has come a long way in supporting multilingual meetings.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Interprefy – Professional remote interpretation plugged into Teams/Zoom for high-accuracy translations. Interprefy
Cross-platform aids Tactiq / other AI transcript tools – Generate real-time transcript then translate it live or post-call (good if native translation isn’t available). Tactiq
Other options Alfaview – Conference software with built-in live translation & interpreter support. Wikipedia

sources.title: 7 Best Tools for Multilingual Real-Time Translation in Video Calls
sources.snippet: Breaking language barriers in video calls has become easier than ever, thanks to modern translation technology. Whether you're running international meetings or connecting with friends abroad, there's now a rich selection of tools that can translate conversations in real time.

sources.title: 7 Best Tools for Multilingual Real-Time Translation in Video Calls
sources.snippet: Breaking language barriers in video calls has become easier than ever, thanks to modern translation technology. Whether you're running international meetings or connecting with friends abroad, there's now a rich selection of tools that can translate conversations in real time.

citation_mappings.claim_text: What to question before picking a tool Do you need live translated audio vs captions/subtitles? How many languages you must support? Will you use AI auto-translation or human interpreters? Supported platforms (Zoom / Teams / Meet / others)? Answering those helps match the right tool to your use case. Fora Soft
